name: Season Hopper
description:
Popping balls has never been so fun!

Themed after four seasons, Season Hopper is an arcade game where you try to pop as many balls as you can before the field reaches the bottom, or time runs out.

Enjoy some beautiful minimalistic art and let your mind rest for a moment.

Features:

  • Random Level Mode: Play a random level where the game will generate a random set of balls with a black one at the end. Once you pop the black ball you win, it's as simple as that! But beware, you only have 90 seconds...
  • Endless Mode: Start with 3 rows of balls and play until they reach the bottom line, every 9-18 seconds (depends on how good you are) the game inserts a new row. Publish your endless game score to the global leader boards and show off your skills
  • Achievements: Keep track of your achievements and try to get  them all
